abstract.para: &susestudio; is an online image creation tool which allows you to build and test appliances in a Web browser. It supports creation of virtual appliances and live systems, based on either &opensuse; or &sle;. Apart from the publicly hosted &susestudio; release that is available at , there is also &suseonsite;. It is a &susestudio; release intended for installation on a server machine behind the firewall.
